title: Ashley Graham shares genius strapless bra hack for ladies with big boobs
text:

If you've ever struggled to find a strapless bra that fits right and looks good, Ashley Graham may have a solution for you.

The 31-year-old model has shared her top tip for buying the perfect strapless bra when you've got big boobs and her fans think it's brilliant.

Graham revealed the hack on Instagram , uploading a photo of herself wearing a black strapless number and matching knickers.

And the key, she claims, is to pick a size that's a little different than what you'd normally go for.

(Image: Getty)

Captioning her post, she wrote: "PRO TIP: The trick to a strapless bra if you're over a DD cup is keeping your size the same but going down a size in the band."

The body positive model went on to say that she's currently a size 38DDD but when it comes to strapless bras, she wears a 36DDD to "keep the girls up".

Her post has been liked more than 490,000 times and many women have thanked her for sharing the helpful advice.

One person said: "I always have a hard time with strapless, thanks for the tip!!!"

Another commented: "Thank you for the tip because I'm a DD girl and I couldn't keep them up for the life of me."

A third replied: "I never knew this! Thank you for sharing."

Someone else suggested that the tip would work for all women, no matter their bra size.

They wrote: "This is probably a pro tip no matter what size you are."

A different user added: "Omg thank you so much for that advice. I struggle with strapless."

However not everyone was convinced by her bra hack, with some thinking it might be "uncomfortable".

One user asked: "Does it not dig in and hurt if it's a size lower?"

Another posted: "Isn't it uncomfortable?"
description: American model Ashley Graham has shared her top tip for finding the perfect strapless bra when you have a fuller bust
